title: ICE when using allocator API via reference

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(allocator_api)] pub fn foo() -> u8 { *Box::new_in(0, &std::alloc::Global) } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.0-nightly (1705a7d64 2021-03-18) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1705a7d64b833d1c4b69958b0627bd054e6d764b commit-date: 2021-03-18 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.52.0-nightly LLVM version: 12.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: i < this.fields.count()', /rustc/1705a7d64b833d1c4b69958b0627bd054e6d764b/compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/layout.rs:2188:21 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.52.0-nightly (1705a7d64 2021-03-18) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/1705a7d64b833d1c4b69958b0627bd054e6d764b/library/std/src/panicking.rs:493:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/1705a7d64b833d1c4b69958b0627bd054e6d764b/library/core/src/panicking.rs:92:14 2: core::panicking::panic at /rustc/1705a7d64b833d1c4b69958b0627bd054e6d764b/library/core/src/panicking.rs:50:5 3: rustc_middle::ty::layout:: for &rustc_middle::ty::TyS>::field::ty_and_layout_kind 4: as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::scalar_pair_element_llvm_type 5: as rustc_codegen_llvm::type_of::LayoutLlvmExt>::scalar_pair_element_llvm_type 6: as rustc_codegen_llvm::abi::FnAbiLlvmExt>::llvm_type 7: rustc_codegen_llvm::mono_item::::predefine_fn 8: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit::module_codegen 9: rustc_middle::dep_graph::::with_deps 10: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 11: rustc_codegen_llvm::base::compile_codegen_unit 12: ::codegen_crate 13: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 14: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::ongoing_codegen 15: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 16: rustc_span::with_source_map 17: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 18: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
